alert.note: Alert for Lower Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:53PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Gusty winds associated with passing showers will impact American Falls Reservoir through 415 PM MDT... At 351 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty winds over northwestern American Falls Reservoir, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... American Falls, American Falls Reservoir, Aberdeen, Fort Hall Buffalo Lodge, Springfield, Pingree, Fort Hall Townsite, and Sterling. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If on or near American Falls Reservoir, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
